name: Spacecraft (itch) (jinwho)
description:
# Spacecraft

spaceship wonder around the space, avoid meteor, fight with aliens, once you reach 1000 will get rewarded

## How to setup

* install python 3.x
* pip install pygame
* python spacecraft.py

## Control

* up : acceleration
* down : deceleration
* left, right : rotate the spaceship
* space bar : shoot lasers

## Resource

* music [here](https://opengameart.org/content/old-city-theme)
* space background [here](https://opengameart.org/content/space-background-1)
* boost sound [here](https://opengameart.org/content/stunt-rally-sounds)
* game over music [here](https://opengameart.org/content/game-over-0)
* secret music [here](https://opengameart.org/content/well-done)
* great stuff from kenny's [SpaceShooterRedux](https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-redux)
+ cool planets and space stuff  [Space Game Art Pack (Extended)](https://opengameart.org/content/space-game-art-pack-extended)
* most of sfx done in generator tool [bfxr](https://www.bfxr.net/)
* sun image [here](http://pixelartmaker.com/art/67c5bb4f1a79b43)
